4. Based on the counting from step 3, we find that Steve Dimarco has directed exactly 2 episodes (rows 2 and 4).

5. Since there is at least one director (Steve Dimarco) who has directed exactly 2 episodes, our claim "there be 3 different directors that direct 2 episode" becomes false as we only need to find 1 instance of a director directing 2 episodes to disprove the claim.

claim: there be no director that direct more than one episode

2. Next, I checked how many distinct directors are present in the table. Since there are only two distinct names (Mike Clattenburg and Steve Dimarco), I know that every director directs only one or two episodes at most.

However, since each row has a unique "prod code", I can also use that to identify duplicate episodes directed by the same person.

4. After checking all 10 episodes in the table, I found no such duplicates, meaning that each director directs only one episode.
